channel.title: Need A Coder! Read To See Offer
channel.description:
Hey guys basically me and my friend have coded a full server but we are stunned at a im sure simple hurdle we cannot make the web client, we have got a VPS which we pay 50$ a month for and we have enough funds to continue to do this for very 2 years so a very stable server.
If you know how to make a web client hosted by VPS please either PM me or comment below also include in the PM any additional coding you know, the more things yo can do the better we will pay you :) please reply/pm soon :)

item.title: Need A Coder! Read To See Offer
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You can’t request a ‘coder’ here, sorry.

Read full topic
